members.name: onTrasitionReceived
members.description: Subscribe to get notified when a transition is received

members.name: initialize
members.description: Initializes the plugin. User will be prompted to allow the app to use location and notifications.

members.name: addOrUpdate
members.description: Adds a new geofence or array of geofences. For geofence object, see above.

members.name: remove
members.description: Removes a geofence or array of geofences. `geofenceID` corresponds to one or more IDs specified when thegeofence was created.

members.name: getWatched
members.description: Returns an array of geofences currently being monitored.

members.name: onTransitionReceived
members.description: Called when a geofence is crossed in the direction specified by `TransitType`.

members.name: onNotificationClicked
members.description: Called when the user clicks a geofence notification. iOS and Android only.
